<a id="FlowContainer"></a>

# FlowContainer

**Inherits:** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [HFlowContainer](HFlowContainer.md), [VFlowContainer](VFlowContainer.md)

A container that arranges its child controls horizontally or vertically and wraps them around at the borders.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A container that arranges its child controls horizontally or vertically and wraps them around at the borders. This is similar to how text in a book wraps around when no more words can fit on a line.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using Containers](../tutorials/ui/gui_containers.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_FlowContainer_AlignmentMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **AlignmentMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_FlowContainer_AlignmentMode)

<a id="FlowContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_BEGIN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_AlignmentMode) **ALIGNMENT_BEGIN** = `0`

The child controls will be arranged at the beginning of the container, i.e. top if orientation is vertical, left if orientation is horizontal (right for RTL layout).<a id="FlowContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_CENTER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_AlignmentMode) **ALIGNMENT_CENTER** = `1`

The child controls will be centered in the container.<a id="FlowContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_END"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_AlignmentMode) **ALIGNMENT_END** = `2`

The child controls will be arranged at the end of the container, i.e. bottom if orientation is vertical, right if orientation is horizontal (left for RTL layout).<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **LastWrapAlignmentMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode)

<a id="FlowContainer_constant_LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_INHERIT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LastWrapAlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode) **LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_INHERIT** = `0`

The last partially filled row or column will wrap aligned to the previous row or column in accordance with [alignment](FlowContainer.md#FlowContainer_property_alignment).<a id="FlowContainer_constant_LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_BEGIN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LastWrapAlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode) **LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_BEGIN** = `1`

The last partially filled row or column will wrap aligned to the beginning of the previous row or column.<a id="FlowContainer_constant_LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_CENTER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LastWrapAlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode) **LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_CENTER** = `2`

The last partially filled row or column will wrap aligned to the center of the previous row or column.<a id="FlowContainer_constant_LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_END"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LastWrapAlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode) **LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_END** = `3`

The last partially filled row or column will wrap aligned to the end of the previous row or column.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="FlowContainer_property_alignment"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[AlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_AlignmentMode) **alignment** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#FlowContainer_property_alignment)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_alignment**\ (\ value\: [AlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_AlignmentMode)\ )
- [AlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_AlignmentMode) **get_alignment**\ (\ )

The alignment of the container's children (must be one of [ALIGNMENT_BEGIN](FlowContainer.md#FlowContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_BEGIN), [ALIGNMENT_CENTER](FlowContainer.md#FlowContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_CENTER), or [ALIGNMENT_END](FlowContainer.md#FlowContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_END)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="FlowContainer_property_last_wrap_alignment"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[LastWrapAlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode) **last_wrap_alignment** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#FlowContainer_property_last_wrap_alignment)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_last_wrap_alignment**\ (\ value\: [LastWrapAlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode)\ )
- [LastWrapAlignmentMode](FlowContainer.md#enum_FlowContainer_LastWrapAlignmentMode) **get_last_wrap_alignment**\ (\ )

The wrap behavior of the last, partially filled row or column (must be one of [LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_INHERIT](FlowContainer.md#FlowContainer_constant_LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_INHERIT), [LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_BEGIN](FlowContainer.md#FlowContainer_constant_LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_BEGIN), [LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_CENTER](FlowContainer.md#FlowContainer_constant_LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_CENTER), or [LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_END](FlowContainer.md#FlowContainer_constant_LAST_WRAP_ALIGNMENT_END)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="FlowContainer_property_reverse_fill"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **reverse_fill** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#FlowContainer_property_reverse_fill)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_reverse_fill**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_reverse_fill**\ (\ )

If ``true``, reverses fill direction. Horizontal **FlowContainer**\\ s will fill rows bottom to top, vertical **FlowContainer**\\ s will fill columns right to left.

When using a vertical **FlowContainer** with a right to left [Control.layout_direction](Control.md#Control_property_layout_direction), columns will fill left to right instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="FlowContainer_property_vertical"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **vertical** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#FlowContainer_property_vertical)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_vertical**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_vertical**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the **FlowContainer** will arrange its children vertically, rather than horizontally.

Can't be changed when using [HFlowContainer](HFlowContainer.md) and [VFlowContainer](VFlowContainer.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>
